Name: Dark Crypt
About the game: Sneak past the undead The dead have risen from their graves and haunt this crypt. Move past them without being seen. Teleport You can't always just walk past the undead. Place a teleport ahead of time and then teleport back to it. Don't get caught! You're defenseless. Your only weapon is your wits and the shadows. Plan your moves Dark Crypt is turn-based, you can take your time to plan and execute the moves. What is Dark Crypt? A turn-based puzzler with a teleporting mechanic about sneaking through an ancient crypt, while avoiding its traps and the undead. The Story The prophecy speaks of an ancient evil that slumbers within a crypt. It foretells its awakening which will lead to our world being consumed by its dark shadow. Your brothers at the monastery dismiss it as a pagan heresy, however you know better than that. The world's fate rests on your shoulders. It's up to you to find the slumbering evil and seal it, before it awakens. Can you save our world? What awaits you 60 challenging levels Boss fights Thinking with teleports Infinite undos Skeletons, Vampires, Spikes and more! Retro-rendition of chill-inducing classical music /
